xxl.core.io.raw
Class RAMRawAccess

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.raw.RAMRawAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
RawAccess
public class RAMRawAccess
extends Object
implements RawAccess

Implements RawAccess via usage of main memory. It is fast and limited to 4GB.

Constructor Summary
RAMRawAccess(long numblocks)
          Returns a new instance of a raw access that uses main memory (with sector size 512 bytes).
RAMRawAccess(long numblocks, int sectorSize)
          Returns a new instance of a raw access that uses main memory.
 
Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the raw access.
 long getNumSectors()
          The amount of blocks
 int getSectorSize()
          Returns the size of a sector of the file/device.
 void open(long numblocks)
          Creates a standard raw access with "numblocks" sectors.
 void open(String filename)
          Creates a standard raw access with 20480 blocks (1MB).
 void read(byte[] block, long sector)
          Reads a block from the raw access.
 String toString()
          Outputs a String representation of the raw device.
 void write(byte[] block, long sector)
          Writes a block to the raw access.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
